ol1.item1: By using any of the products, software, or services available at farue.rwth-aachen.de (collectively referred to as “Services”) provided by Familienwohnheim Rütscher Straße (in the following “FaRü” or simply “we”), you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions (“Terms of Service”).
ol1.item2: We reserve the right to update and change the Terms of Service at any time without notice. You can review the most current version of the Terms of Service at: https://www.farue.rwth-aachen.de/info/about/terms
ol1.item3: The failure of us to exercise or enforce any right or provision of the Terms of Service shall not constitute a waiver of such right or provision.
ol1.item4: You agree that we own all legal rights in the Service. You must not remove, modify, or obscure any legal notices. You are not entitled to use our trademarks, trade names, brands, domain names, or other distinctive brand features.
ol1.item5: Violation of any of the terms below can result in the termination of your user-account or access to the Services. Violation of any of the terms will also terminate your usage rights of the Services.
ol1.item6: These Terms of Service constitute the entire agreement between you and FaRü und replace all previous agreements under this title. There are no verbal subsidiary agreements.
ol1.item7: These Terms of Service, and your relationship with us under these Terms of Service, shall be governed by the laws of Germany. You and FaRü agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in Aachen, Germany, to resolve any legal matter arising from the Terms of Service.
ol1.item8: Any feedback or suggestions provided by you may be used by us without any restriction and we are under no obligation to keep them confidential.

section2.title: Provision of the Services by FaRü

ol1.item1: Your use of the Services is at your sole risk. The Services are provided on an “as is” and “as available” basis.
ol1.item2: We do not warrant that (i) the Services will meet your requirements or expectations, (ii) the Services will be delivered uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free, (iii) the results that may be obtained from the use of the Services will be accurate or reliable, (iv) any errors in the Services will be corrected.
ol1.item3: You understand and agree that we shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential or exemplary damages, including but not limited to any loss of profit, loss of goodwill, loss of business reputation, loss of data, cost of procurement of substitute goods or Services, or other intangible loss, resulting from: (i) the use or the inability to use the Services; (ii) any changes we may make to the Services, or any permanent or temporary cessation in the provision of the Services; (iii) unauthorized access to or alteration of your transmissions or data; (iv) the deletion of, corruption of, or failure to store, any content and other communications data maintained or transmitted by or through the use of the Services; (v) or any other matter relating to the Services.
ol1.item4: Technical support is provided on a best-effort basis and only by e-mail.
ol1.item5: You understand that we can use third parties (e.g., hosting partners) to provide the necessary resources (e.g., hardware, software, networking, storage, etc.) to run the Services.
ol1.item6: We may stop, remove, modify, or add (permanently or temporarily) Services (or features within Services) at our sole discretion. Any new, changed, or removed features are subject to the Terms of Service. Continued use of the Services after any such changes constitute your consent to the changes.

section3.title: Use of the Services by you

ol1.item1: You agree to use the Services only for purposes that are permitted by (i) the Terms of Service and (ii) any applicable law, regulation or generally accepted practices or guidelines in the relevant jurisdictions.
ol1.item2: For certain services, we may offer or require you to register for a user-account. You ensure that all registration information you provide will always be valid, correct, and up to date. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your user-account and password. User accounts registered by bots or other automated methods are not permitted.
ol1.item3: You must be a tenant in Familienwohnheim Rütscher Straße to create a user account and use any services that require a user account. You agree not to try to bypass any measures employed by us to prevent users without a user account from accessing services that are only available to registered users.
ol1.item4: When registering for a user account and whenever you use any service only provided for registered users, you additionally agree to the General Statute of Familienwohnheim Rütscher Straße.

item5.par1: Depending on the service you use, you are bound by additional Statutes:

ol1.item1: If you want to use the internet access provided at Familienwohnheim Rütscher Straße, you agree to the Network Statute.
ol1.item2: If you want to use the washing machines or dryers at Familienwohnheim Rütscher Straße, you agree to the Washing Statute.
ol1.item3: If you want to use the tool rental service at Familienwohnheim Rütscher Straße, you agree to the Tool Rental Statute.

ol1.item6: For certain services, we may offer to upload your personal profile photo. You are responsible to not upload an abusive photo, to not infringe on any copyrights or trademarks, and to not use a design which other users of our services may deem offensive.
ol1.item7: For certain services, we may require you to provide photos or scans of documents. You ensure that the documents you provide are valid, correct and up to date and that you are the owner of these documents.
ol1.item8: You agree that you will not impersonate another person.
ol1.item9: You agree that you will not engage in any activity that interferes with or disrupts the Services (or the servers and networks which are connected to the Services).
ol1.item10: You agree that you will not reproduce, duplicate, copy, sell, trade or resell the Services for any purpose without our express written permission.
ol1.item11: You agree that you are solely responsible for (and that we have no responsibility to you or to any third party for) any breach of your obligations under the Terms of Service and for the consequences (including any loss or damage which we may suffer) of any such breach.
ol1.item12: You agree to our privacy policy.
ol1.item13: We reserve the right (but have no obligation) to pre-screen, review, flag, filter, modify, refuse or remove any or all content or user-account from any of the Services at our sole discretion. You understand that by using the Services you may be exposed to content that you may find offensive, indecent or objectionable and that, in this respect, you use the Services at your own risk.
